spec.name: Olympic Pool Med V Complex
spec.description: The Olympic Pool (Piscine Olympique) is a major public swimming facility located within the Mohammed V Sports Complex in Casablanca. Designed to Olympic standards, it is used for competitive swimming, training, and public recreational use. It serves as a central hub for aquatic sports in the city.

timeline.title: Construction Period
timeline.description: The pool was built as part of the expansion of the Mohammed V Sports Complex (Approximate date).
